author: egli
msg: Added the Exception selector to the sitemap which catches
the ParentNotFoundException and returns a nice error message
when a document is published whose parent doc hasn't been
Added a nice error screen in the lenya look.
Added usecase pipelines for info-meta saving.

author: egli
msg: The publisher now returns a special Exception if the piblishing
failed because the parent node could not be located in the
live tree, i.e. when the user publishes a document whose
parent document has not been published.
